introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to Namuy Learning. These Terms and Conditions ('Terms') govern access to and use of our educational platform and academic services ('Services') offered by Namuy Learning ('we', 'our', or 'the Company') in Colombia, Latin America, the United States, and Europe. By using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. It is essential that you read and fully understand these Terms before using our Services.

acceptanceOfTerms.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptanceOfTerms.text: By accessing or using our Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to be legally bound by these Terms, as well as by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated herein by reference. If you do not agree to these Terms, you should not access or use our Services.

servicesDescription.title: Description of Services
servicesDescription.text: Namuy Learning provides an online platform that offers access to a variety of courses, tutoring, educational materials, academic support, and other related resources. Our Services are designed to provide a comprehensive and personalized educational experience, facilitating learning across multiple disciplines and educational levels.

userResponsibilities.title: 4. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.text: By using our Services, you agree to comply with the following obligations and responsibilities, designed to ensure a safe and constructive experience for all users and protect the interests of Namuy Learning:

points.title: Accuracy and Updating of Data
points.description: You agree to provide truthful, accurate, up-to-date, and complete personal information during the registration process and when requested thereafter. It is your responsibility to keep such information updated to reflect any changes in your personal data.

subpoints.title: Confidentiality of Credentials
subpoints.description: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your username and password, and for restricting access to your account. You must not share your credentials with third parties or allow others to use your account.

subpoints.title: Responsibility for Activities
subpoints.description: You are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your account. If you suspect or become aware of any unauthorized use of your account, you must notify Namuy Learning immediately through the provided contact channels.

subpoints.title: Limited Use
subpoints.description: The Services and resources provided by Namuy Learning are intended solely for your personal and educational use. It is strictly prohibited to use the Services for commercial, profit-driven, or any other unauthorized purposes without prior written consent from Namuy Learning.

points.title: Prohibition of Illegal or Unauthorized Use

subpoints.title: Compliance with Laws
subpoints.description: You agree not to use the Services for any illegal, fraudulent, or unauthorized purposes, including but not limited to violations of intellectual property laws, privacy, data protection, fraud, money laundering, terrorism, or any other applicable regulations in Colombia, Latin America, the United States, Europe, or any other relevant jurisdiction.

subpoints.title: Prohibited Activities
subpoints.description: You must not engage in activities that may harm, disable, overload, or deteriorate the Services or interfere with the use and enjoyment of the Services by other users.

subpoints.title: Interaction with the Community
subpoints.description: You agree to interact with other users, instructors, and Namuy Learning staff in a respectful and professional manner. You must refrain from using language or behaviors that are offensive, abusive, harassing, defamatory, obscene, or discriminatory.

subpoints.title: Equality and Diversity
subpoints.description: Participation in acts of discrimination or incitement to hatred based on race, color, religion, sex, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, socioeconomic status, or any other characteristic protected by law is prohibited.

subpoints.title: Prohibited Content
subpoints.description: You must not post, upload, transmit, or share content that is illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, tortious, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, pornographic, invasive of others' privacy, hateful, racially, ethnically, or otherwise objectionable.

subpoints.title: Protection of Minors
subpoints.description: Any content that exploits or endangers minors, including representations of child abuse or any related activity, is strictly prohibited.

subpoints.title: Prohibition of Plagiarism
subpoints.description: You agree to submit assignments, projects, exams, and any other academic activities that are the product of your own effort and creation. Plagiarism, copying, data falsification, or any form of academic fraud is strictly prohibited.

subpoints.title: Collaboration Rules
subpoints.description: You must adhere to the established collaboration rules for each course or activity. Unauthorized assistance in assessments, tasks, or exams is prohibited. Sharing answers, solutions, or any material that may compromise academic integrity is forbidden.

subpoints.title: Legal Use of Content
subpoints.description: You agree not to reproduce, distribute, modify, create derivative works, publicly display, perform, transmit, or otherwise use content protected by copyrights, trademarks, patents, trade secrets, or other intellectual property rights without the explicit permission of the rights holder.

subpoints.title: Limited License
subpoints.description: Educational materials and resources available on the platform are for your personal and non-commercial use in the context of your participation in the Services. Sharing, distributing, selling, or exploiting such materials to third parties is prohibited.

subpoints.title: Confidential Information
subpoints.description: You may have access to confidential information of Namuy Learning or other users. You agree to maintain the confidentiality of such information and not disclose it without the prior written consent of the owner.

sections.subtitle: 4.6 Security and Protection of the Platform

subpoints.title: Integrity of Services
subpoints.description: Interfering with or disrupting the operation of the Services, servers, or networks connected to the Services, including transmitting any viruses, worms, malware, or any other destructive or harmful code, is prohibited.

subpoints.title: Restricted Access
subpoints.description: You must not attempt to access unauthorized accounts, computer systems, or networks connected to the Services through hacking, password extraction, or any other illegitimate means.

subpoints.title: System Protection
subpoints.description: You agree not to introduce any software or material into the platform that may cause damage or alter the functioning of Namuy Learning's systems or those of other users.

subpoints.title: Legal Compliance
subpoints.description: You agree to comply with all applicable local, regional, national, and international laws, rules, and regulations when using the Services, including but not limited to data protection laws, intellectual property laws, unfair competition, and consumer protection.

subpoints.title: Adherence to Policies
subpoints.description: You must adhere to all additional policies, terms, and conditions provided by Namuy Learning in relation to the Services, which may be updated periodically.

subpoints.title: Individual Responsibility
subpoints.description: You are solely responsible for the content you post, upload, or transmit through the Services. You guarantee that such content is legal, does not infringe on third-party rights, and complies with these Terms.

subpoints.title: Granted Rights
subpoints.description: By submitting content, you grant Namuy Learning the necessary rights to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, distribute, and display such content in relation to the provision of the Services.

subpoints.title: Incident Communication
subpoints.description: You must immediately inform Namuy Learning about any security breaches, unauthorized use of your account, or any other violations of which you are aware.

subpoints.title: Damage Compensation
subpoints.description: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Namuy Learning, its affiliates, directors, employees, agents, and licensors from any claims, demands, losses, damages, costs, and expenses, including reasonable attorney fees, arising from your use of the Services, your content, your violation of these Terms, or any laws or rights of third parties.

subpoints.title: Assumption of Risk
subpoints.description: You acknowledge that you use the Services at your own risk. Namuy Learning will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use the Services.

subpoints.title: Prohibition of Solicitations
subpoints.description: You must not promote or distribute unsolicited advertising materials, spam, chain letters, pyramid schemes, or other forms of unauthorized solicitation through the Services.

subpoints.title: Personal Data Protection
subpoints.description: Collecting, storing, or using personal data of other users without their explicit consent and in compliance with applicable data protection laws is prohibited.

subpoints.title: Account Suspension or Termination
subpoints.description: Namuy Learning reserves the right to suspend or terminate your access to the Services without prior notice if you violate these Terms or engage in activities that may harm other users, the platform, or the company.

subpoints.title: Legal Proceedings
subpoints.description: Failure to comply with these Terms may result in legal actions under applicable laws, including claims for damages, injunctive relief, or other legal remedies.

subpoints.title: Cooperation with Authorities
subpoints.description: In cases of serious or illegal violations, Namuy Learning may report to competent authorities and fully cooperate with investigations or legal proceedings.
